mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.icon, m.menu_name, m.parent, m.sort FROM `ums_menu` AS m WHERE m.`menu_type` IN ('I', 'M') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`is_deleted` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent, m.sort

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.icon, m.menu_name, m.parent, m.sort FROM `ums_member_role_relation` AS mr JOIN `ums_role_menu_relation` AS rm ON mr.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` JOIN `ums_menu` AS m ON rm.`menu_id` = m.`id` WHERE mr.`member_id` = #{memberId} AND m.`menu_type` IN ('I', 'M') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`is_deleted` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent, m.sort
